title: Machine Learning Researcher
name: Indian Instute of Technology
description: Developed GENETT, a PyTorch-based NLP framework for bias-neutral text transformation, achieving superior performance over 10 state-of-the-art models in content preservation (BLEU 54.1) and fluency (PPL 1.24).
Created the first-of-its-kind GENRE dataset (5,230 samples), leveraging pandas and spaCy for preprocessing.
Automated data workflows using Apache Airflow, reducing manual effort by 40% and boosting efficiency by 15%.

title: Software Engineer Intern
name: Gram Vaani
description: Created scalable Django APIs to support a WhatsApp chatbot serving 37,000 users in rural India.
Enhanced FAQ retrieval accuracy using BERT, reaching a 70% top-3 match rate.
Improved system performance by reducing API response times by 20% through optimized database indexing and asynchronous processing with Celery.

title: Student Tech Lead
name: Information Technology Services
description: Managed a 10-member technical team to deliver reliable support for over 45 campus events annually.
Provided hands-on troubleshooting for Extron AV systems, resolving 3-5 integration issues weekly.
Automated service desk operations in TDX using Python scripts, saving 50+ hours of manual effort yearly.
Strengthened cross-functional communication and developed leadership, and client service skills in a fast-paced academic environment.

title: Middlebury College
description: BA in Computer Science and Math Minor
Graduated Summa Cum Laude with CS Departmental Honors
Specialized in Operating Systems, Machine Learning, and Software Development.

title: UWC Mahindra College
description: Completed the IB Diploma Programme, with a score of 40/45.
